import re

source.e27396ed:
from nltk.corpus import stopwords
from nltk.stem.porter import PorterStemmer
corpus_1 = []
for i in range(0,7613):
    review = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z]', ' ', Tweets_data['text'][i])
    review = review.lower()
    review = review.split()
    ps = PorterStemmer()
    all_stopwords = stopwords.words('english')
    all_stopwords.remove('not')
    review = [ps.stem(word) for word in review if not word in set(all_stopwords)]
    review = ' '.join(review)
    corpus_1.append(review)
source.9c147071:
corpus_2 = []
for j in range(0,3263):
    review1 = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z]', ' ', Tweets_data_test['text'][j])
    review1 = review1.lower()
    review1 = review1.split()
    ps1 = PorterStemmer()
    review1 = [ps1.stem(word) for word in review1 if not word in set(all_stopwords)]
    review1 = ' '.join(review1)
    corpus_2.append(review1)
source.709650ba:
from sklearn.feature_extraction.text import CountVectorizer
cv = CountVectorizer()
X_fit = cv.fit(corpus_1)
X_train = X_fit.transform(corpus_1).toarray()
X_test = X_fit.transform(corpus_2).toarray()
y = Tweets_data.iloc[:, -1].values
source.3d0ff083:

rf = RandomForestClassifier(n_estimators=150, max_depth=None, n_jobs=-1)
rf_model = rf.fit(X_train, y)
